data.title: Magasin Du Nord - Solstra

data.text:
Selected Investments Cases

Solstra Capital acquired both the operating company (“OpCo”) and the property company (“PropCo”) of Magasin du Nord in 2009. Solstra Capital was able to secure the entry of the British department store chain Debenhams as the operator. In turn, Debenhams was benefited with significant economies of scale and further improved performance. Subsequently the Magasin du Nord stores were sold to Danish pension funds with Debenhams as the operator on a long lease.
